definition: to decide/to determine/to execute (sb)/(of a dam etc) to breach or burst/definitely/certainly

sentences.english: Sucess depends on your endeavor and capability.
sentences.chinese: 成功與否取決於你的努力和能力。

sentences.english: Appreciation of sculpture depends upon the ability to respond to form in three dimension.
sentences.chinese: 對雕塑的鑑賞力取決於對立體的反應能力。

sentences.english: I think it depends what they're offered, ' said Lupin .
sentences.chinese: “我想這取決於他們會得到什麼好處，”盧平說。

sentences.english: Now, in practice, it depends on how good your measurement is.
sentences.chinese: 在實踐中，它取決於你的測量方法有多高明。

sentences.english: Absorption is also dependent upon air flow rates and the partial pressure of the gases in the inspired air.
sentences.chinese: 吸收也取決於空氣流速和吸入空氣中的氣體分壓。

sentences.english: And it’s goingto be up to you to make an even bigger difference over the next 40years.
sentences.chinese: 未來40年更大的改變也將取決於你們。

sentences.english: It appears, however, that the "drag coefficient", CD, also depends on the velocity of the ball.
sentences.chinese: 然而，阻力系數CD，也取決於球的速度。
成功取決於我們的努力。

sentences.english: "Small" is a subjective term, so a "small" release depends upon your definition.
sentences.chinese: “小”是一個主觀性的詞語，取決於您的定義。

sentences.english: Quenching degree is mainly determined by chemical composition and organization structure of steel.
sentences.chinese: 淬透性主要取決於鋼的化學成分和鋼的組織結構。

sentences.english: The habitability of Earth depends on a lot more than just orbit location and its mass.
sentences.chinese: 地球的可居住性不僅僅取決於它的位置和雲層。

sentences.english: The budget will depend on the script, what kind of financing the producer can get, and also who is cast in the movie.
sentences.chinese: 預算取決於劇本，獲得的投資以及影片的演員陣容。

sentences.english: It all depends on what you decide to believe.
sentences.chinese: 這一切都取決於你決定要相信什麼。

sentences.english: Whether we will go picnicking tomorrow depends on the weather.
sentences.chinese: 明天我們是否去野餐取決於天氣好壞。

sentences.english: As the macro-scale fundamental construction, thermal power electricity generation has important impact on national economy.
sentences.chinese: 火力發電廠的經濟性主要取決於電站鍋爐的熱效率。

sentences.english: It is up to the modeling team to establish conventions of model organization and interdependency.
sentences.chinese: 這取決於建模團隊建立模型管理和相互依賴的約定。

definition: whether or not (at the end of a phrase)
no matter what or how/regardless of whether...
whatever/no matter what (who, how etc)/regardless of/not to discuss
unrelated/having nothing to do (with sth else)
to decide (to do something)/to resolve/decision/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]/certainly
varying from person to person (idiom); different for each individual
to test/to put to the test/trial/ordeal
